channel.title: Nginx on 項 思 偉 ~ Aal Izz Well!
channel.description: Recent content in Nginx on 項 思 偉 ~ Aal Izz Well!

item.title: Compile static nginx
item.description: Get nginx source code from officall website wget http://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.10.2.tar.gz Untar it to specific directory tar zxf nginx-1.10.2.tar.gz -C /src Go to the /src, and execute ./configure cd /src/nginx-1.10.2 ./configure --prefix=/src/nginx/ \ --with-cc-opt="-static -static-libgcc" \ --with-ld-opt="-static" Build it with make -$(nproc) Error output But get the error: /usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/4.9.4/../../../../lib64/libpcre.a(libpcre_la-pcre_jit_compile.o): In function `sljit_generate_code': (.text+0x79f): undefined reference to `pthread_mutex_lock' /usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/4.9.4/../../../../lib64/libpcre.a(libpcre_la-pcre_jit_compile.o): In function `sljit_generate_code': (.text+0x894): undefined reference to `pthread_mutex_unlock' /usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/4.9.4/../../../../lib64/libpcre.a(libpcre_la-pcre_jit_compile.o): In function `sljit_generate_code': (.
